channel.title: ZBLogger on Zeebe Node.js Client Guide
channel.description: Recent content in ZBLogger on Zeebe Node.js Client Guide

item.title: ZBLogger
item.description: The ZBLogger class is available for you to use for logging in your application. import { ZBLogger } from 'zeebe-node' const logger = new ZBLogger({ loglevel: 'INFO', namespace: 'my-application-context', }) logger.info('Starting...') const { ZBLogger } = require('zeebe-node') const logger = new ZBLogger({ loglevel: 'INFO', namespace: 'my-application-context', }) logger.info('Starting...')
